spec_data.Name: perl-Catalyst-Plugin-Authorization-Roles
spec_data.Description:
Role based access control is very simple: every user has a list of roles,
which that user is allowed to assume, and every restricted part of the app
makes an assertion about the necessary roles.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:23:05 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Role based authorization for Catalyst based on Catalyst::Plugin::Authentication
